hcm.ssj.audio

Class PlaybackThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • hcm.ssj.audio.PlaybackThread

  • public class PlaybackThread
extends java.lang.Object
    Background thread for audio playback.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlaybackThread(android.content.Context c, java.io.File file) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isPlaying()
      Returns true if the current thread is currently playing audio.
      void pause()
      Pauses the playback of the loaded audio file.
      void play()
      Plays the loaded audio file and starts updating marker's position.
      void removePlaybackListener()
      Removes the listener of the current thread.
      void reset()
      Stops and resets the playback of the loaded audio file and repositions the marker's position to the origin.
      void resetFinishedPlaying() 
      void seekTo(int progress)
      Skips the playback of the current thread to the selected time.
      void setPlaybackListener(PlaybackListener listener)
      Sets the listener for the current thread.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

                      java.io.File file)

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        Plays the loaded audio file and starts updating marker's position.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses the playback of the loaded audio file.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Stops and resets the playback of the loaded audio file and repositions the marker's position to the origin.

      • resetFinishedPlaying

        public void resetFinishedPlaying()

      • setPlaybackListener

        public void setPlaybackListener(PlaybackListener listener)
        Sets the listener for the current thread. Only one such thread is allowed to have a PlaybackListener.
        Parameters:
        listener - PlaybackListener.

      • removePlaybackListener

        public void removePlaybackListener()
        Removes the listener of the current thread.

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Returns true if the current thread is currently playing audio.
        Returns:
        True if audio is being played back, false otherwise.

      • seekTo

        public void seekTo(int progress)
        Skips the playback of the current thread to the selected time.
        Parameters:
        progress - Time in milliseconds to skip forward or backward to.
